xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has quit 08:34 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 11:10 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:12 <sdumitriu> has quit 11:54 <allasm> has joined #phenotips 11:54 <sdumitriu1> allasm: https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/patient-access-rules/ui/src/main/resources/PhenoTips/PatientAccessRightsManagement.xml#L721 11:57 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/rightsmanager/RightsManagerPluginApi.java#L210 13:24 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 13:24 <sdumitriu1> Depends 14:43 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 16:51 <sdumitriu1> akats: https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/679 17:01 <akats> Hmm... 17:03 <akats> The way I see this there are two options on the table for me. Either write some code that cross-references presence of the original term in the getAncestors call OR comment out the line that adds the current term and add a TODO note 17:03 <sdumitriu1> Read Marta's comment 17:06 <akats> I did, but the new function doesn't exist yet in OnotlogyTerm 17:06 <sdumitriu1> Right, it must be created 17:07 <akats> Are you saying you want me to do it? 17:07 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:07 <akats> Ok 17:07 <sdumitriu1> You're assigned, aren't you? 17:08 <akats> Don't think so. I might be blind though 17:08 <akats> Wait there it is. 17:35 <akats> has quit 22:17 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 23:45 <sdumitriu> has quit
